DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation telephone care management intervention design improve outcome among depressed diabetes patient .
DOC.brief_title: Effective Care Management Depressed Diabetes Patients ( The Positive Steps Study )
DOC.detailed_description: Research Plan : 382 patient ages 21-80 , include 177 woman , 123 Blacks Ann Arbor VA HCS , UM , Genesys Health Care System Flint . Patients randomize : ( 1 ) brief education depression , diabetes self-care , physical activity ; ( 2 ) telephone care management include antidepressant medication care management ( MCM ) and/or cognitive behavioral therapy ( CBT ) . The MCM module use standard algorithm identify efficacious antidepressant promote adherence . The CBT module address symptom , exercise , communication skill . Methods : Surveys : Patients complete clinic-based survey baseline 12-months measure health status , self-care , provider-patient communication , resource use . At 4 month , complete mail questionnaire capture short-term change depressive symptom , walk , patient-provider communication , medication adherence , quality-of-life . Physiologic Measures : At baseline 12-months , patient ' A1c cholesterol measure via fingerstick blood test . We also measure blood pressure , height , weight . With patient ' 4-month mailed survey , complete fingerstick A1c test return result via mail . The blood test identical diabetes patient use self-monitor blood glucose . Pedometers : We measure distance walk baseline , 4 month , 12 month use pedometer . Patients record walk distance one week return result via mail . Electronic data : Utilization billing database use identify health service utilization ( ER visit , outpatient care , hospitalization ) occur patient ' participation prior 12 month . Physician feedback . At patient ' 12-month assessment , physician complete brief survey patient 's communication style . All patient provide write consent administer prior face-to-face screen baseline interview . Physician 12-month survey patient ' communication style anonymous .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria . Patients must meet following criterion : Active Diabetes ( Type 1 & 2 ) Diagnosis depression Using hypoglycemic medication At least 1 outpatient visit last 12 month At least 21 year old Exclusion Criteria . Patients follow exclude : Limited life expectancy ( heart failure/ oxygen/ advanced stage cancer/ dialysis ) End stage renal disease Lung cancer Dementia Bipolar Schizophrenia Ca n't speak English Memory problem Alcohol problem Illegal drug use Minimal depressive symptom Blood pressure 180/110 high Problems loss consciousness Ca n't walk 10 minute level surface Not plan get care study site PCP affiliate study site Are stable regimen ( change depression Rx last 2830 day ) Type 1 diabetic diagnose age 15
